question: This is what you see behind the wheel. Please count  how many vehicles are in the scenario and describe each vehicle.
answer: I see 4 vehicles in the scenario. They are: A yellow car driving down the road. A dark-colored car parked on the right side of the road. A black SUV parked further ahead on the right. A larger black vehicle with an open cargo area, parked on the right side near the grassy area.
